sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CART_GOODS( ESNTL_ID, CART_SN, GOODS_CODE, PURCHS_AMOUNT, TOUR_DE, CHKIN_DE, CHCKT_DE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, EXPRTN_AT, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT, DELETE_AT, ORIGIN_AMOUNT, PURCHS_AT, FLIGHT_SN ) VALUES( #esntl_id#, #cart_sn#, #goods_code#, #purchs_amount#, #tour_de#, #chkin_de#, #chckt_de#, #begin_time#, #end_time#, 'N', #esntl_id#, SYSDATE, 'N', #origin_amount#, 'N', #flight_sn# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_CART_GOODS SET TOUR_DE = #tour_de# , CHKIN_DE = #chkin_de# , CHCKT_DE = #chckt_de# , BEGIN_TIME = #begin_time# , END_TIME = #end_time# , UPDT_ID = #esntl_id# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_CART_GOODS SET DELETE_AT = 'Y', DELETE_ID = #esntl_id#, DELETE_DT = SYSDATE WHERE CART_SN = #cart_sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CART_NMPR( CART_SN, GOODS_CODE, SETUP_SE, NMPR_SN, NMPR_CO, AMOUNT ) VALUES( #cart_sn#, #goods_code#, #setup_se#, #nmpr_sn#, #nmpr_co#, #amount# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT CART_SN FROM TB_CART_GOODS WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND TOUR_DE IS NOT NULL AND TOUR_DE = #tour_de# AND BEGIN_TIME = #begin_time# AND END_TIME = #end_time#

SELECT A.GOODS_NM FROM TB_GOODS A, TB_GOODS_SCHDUL B WHERE A.GOODS_CODE = B.GOODS_CODE AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND B.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# AND (( A.STAYNG_FCLTY_AT = 'N' AND #tour_de# BETWEEN B.BEGIN_DE AND B.END_DE ) OR ( A.STAYNG_FCLTY_AT = 'Y' AND #chkin_de# BETWEEN B.BEGIN_DE AND B.END_DE AND #chckt_de# BETWEEN B.BEGIN_DE AND B.END_DE ))

SELECT GOODS_NM FROM TB_GOODS A INNER JOIN TB_GOODS_TIME B ON B.GOODS_CODE = A.GOODS_CODE AND B.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND B.BEGIN_TIME = #begin_time# AND B.END_TIME = #end_time# WHERE A.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'

SELECT CF_START_DATE, CF_END_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DTRMC_START_DT) AS ROWSEQ , TO_CHAR(DTRMC_ARVL_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') CF_START_DATE , TO_CHAR(HMCMG_START_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') CF_END_DATE FROM TB_FLIGHT A WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND EXPRTN_AT = 'N' ) X WHERE X.ROWSEQ = 1
AND #tour_de# BETWEEN CF_START_DATE AND CF_END_DATE
AND #chkin_de# BETWEEN CF_START_DATE AND CF_END_DATE AND #chckt_de# BETWEEN CF_START_DATE AND CF_END_DATE
AND #tour_de# BETWEEN CF_START_DATE AND CF_END_DATE

SELECT TOUR_DE , LPAD(TRUNC(CF_START_DATE), 2, '0')||LPAD((CF_START_DATE-TRUNC(CF_START_DATE))*60, 2, '0') CF_START_DT , LPAD(TRUNC(CF_END_DATE), 2, '0')||LPAD((CF_END_DATE-TRUNC(CF_END_DATE))*60, 2, '0') CF_END_DT FROM (SELECT A.TOUR_DE, A.BEGIN_TIME, A.END_TIME, B.WAIT_TIME, B.MVMN_TIME, A.GOODS_CODE , (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BEGIN_TIME, 1, 2)) + DECODE(SUBSTR(BEGIN_TIME, 3, 4), '00', 0, '30', 0.5)) - (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(WAIT_TIME, 1, 2)) + DECODE(SUBSTR(WAIT_TIME, 3, 4), '00', 0, '30', 0.5)) CF_START_DATE , (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(END_TIME, 1, 2)) + DECODE(SUBSTR(END_TIME, 3, 4), '00', 0, '30', 0.5)) + (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MVMN_TIME, 1, 2)) + DECODE(SUBSTR(MVMN_TIME, 3, 4), '00', 0, '30', 0.5) ) CF_END_DATE FROM TB_CART_GOODS A , TB_GOODS B WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id#
AND A.CART_SN <> #cart_sn#
AND A.EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND A.TOUR_DE IS NOT NULL AND A.GOODS_CODE = B.GOODS_CODE ) WHERE TOUR_DE = #tour_de# AND ( (LPAD(TRUNC(CF_START_DATE), 2, '0')||LPAD((CF_START_DATE-TRUNC(CF_START_DATE))*60, 2, '0') < #real_begin_time# AND #real_begin_time# < LPAD(TRUNC(CF_END_DATE), 2, '0')||LPAD((CF_END_DATE-TRUNC(CF_END_DATE))*60, 2, '0')) OR (LPAD(TRUNC(CF_START_DATE), 2, '0')||LPAD((CF_START_DATE-TRUNC(CF_START_DATE))*60, 2, '0') < #real_end_time# AND #real_end_time# < LPAD(TRUNC(CF_END_DATE), 2, '0')||LPAD((CF_END_DATE-TRUNC(CF_END_DATE))*60, 2, '0')))

SELECT A.CHKIN_DE, A.CHCKT_DE FROM TB_CART_GOODS A , TB_GOODS B WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND A.EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND A.CHKIN_DE IS NOT NULL AND A.CHCKT_DE IS NOT NULL AND A.GOODS_CODE = B.GOODS_CODE AND ( TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#chkin_de#, 'YYYYMMDD')+1, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.CHKIN_DE AND A.CHCKT_DE OR TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#chckt_de#, 'YYYYMMDD')-1, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN A.CHKIN_DE AND A.CHCKT_DE)
SELECT NVL(SUM(PURCHS_AMOUNT), 0) AS PURCHS_AMOUNT FROM TB_CART_GOODS WHERE ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND DELETE_AT = 'N'

SELECT nvl(SUM(DECODE(FN_STAYNG_FCLTY_AT(A.GOODS_CODE), 'N', C.SETUP_AMOUNT * B.NMPR_CO, C.SETUP_AMOUNT * (TO_DATE(A.CHCKT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(A.CHKIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD')) )), 0) AS PURCHS_AMOUNT FROM TB_CART_GOODS A , TB_CART_NMPR B , TB_GOODS_NMPR C WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = B.ESNTL_ID AND A.CART_SN = B.CART_SN AND B.GOODS_CODE = C.GOODS_CODE AND B.NMPR_SN = C.NMPR_SN AND A.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND A.EXPRTN_AT = 'N'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.TOUR_DE ORDER BY A.TOUR_DE) TOUR_SN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.TOUR_DE ORDER BY A.BEGIN_TIME DESC) TOUR_SN_DESC , A.ESNTL_ID , A.GOODS_CODE , A.CART_SN , A.TOUR_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.TOUR_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM/DD(DY)') CF_TOUR_DE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.TOUR_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'DY','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') TOUR_DY , A.BEGIN_TIME , A.END_TIME , SUBSTR(A.BEGIN_TIME, 1, 2)||':'||SUBSTR(A.BEGIN_TIME, 3, 4) CF_BEGIN_TIME , SUBSTR(A.END_TIME, 1, 2)||':'||SUBSTR(A.END_TIME, 3, 4) CF_END_TIME , X.GOODS_NM , X.FILE_CODE , X.WAIT_TIME , X.MVMN_TIME , A.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE FROM TB_CART_GOODS A INNER JOIN TB_GOODS X ON X.GOODS_CODE = A.GOODS_CODE AND X.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND A.EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.TOUR_DE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.TOUR_DE, BEGIN_TIME, A.CART_SN

SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT , A.ESNTL_ID , A.CART_SN , A.GOODS_CODE , A.PURCHS_AMOUNT , A.TOUR_DE , A.BEGIN_TIME , A.END_TIME , X.GOODS_NM , X.CL_SE , X.FILE_CODE , X.WAIT_TIME , X.MVMN_TIME , A.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE , A.CHKIN_DE , A.CHCKT_DE , DECODE(A.TOUR_DE, NULL, TO_DATE(A.CHCKT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(A.CHKIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), '', TO_DATE(A.CHCKT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(A.CHKIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 0 ) DIFF_DAYS , DECODE(X.CL_SE, 'S', A.CHKIN_DE, A.TOUR_DE) SORT_DE , (SELECT CTY_NM FROM TB_CTY Y WHERE Y.CTY_CODE = X.CTY_CODE) CTY_NM , (SELECT CL_NM FROM TB_TOUR_CL Y WHERE Y.UPPER_CL_CODE = '00000' START WITH Y.CL_CODE = X.CL_CODE CONNECT BY PRIOR UPPER_CL_CODE = CL_CODE) UPPER_CL_NM , (SELECT CL_NM FROM TB_TOUR_CL Y WHERE Y.CL_CODE = X.CL_CODE) CL_NM FROM TB_CART_GOODS A INNER JOIN TB_GOODS X ON X.GOODS_CODE = A.GOODS_CODE AND X.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND A.EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND A.TOUR_DE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.TOUR_DE, A.BEGIN_TIME
AND A.CHKIN_DE IS NOT NULL AND A.CHCKT_DE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.CHKIN_DE
ORDER BY DECODE(X.CL_SE, 'S', A.CHKIN_DE, A.TOUR_DE), A.BEGIN_TIME

SELECT COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOT_CNT , A.ESNTL_ID , A.CART_SN , A.GOODS_CODE , A.PURCHS_AMOUNT , A.TOUR_DE , A.BEGIN_TIME , A.END_TIME , X.GOODS_NM , X.CL_SE , X.FILE_CODE , X.WAIT_TIME , X.MVMN_TIME , A.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE , A.CHKIN_DE , A.CHCKT_DE , DECODE(A.TOUR_DE, NULL, TO_DATE(A.CHCKT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(A.CHKIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), '', TO_DATE(A.CHCKT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD') - TO_DATE(A.CHKIN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 0 ) DIFF_DAYS , DECODE(X.CL_SE, 'S', A.CHKIN_DE, A.TOUR_DE) SORT_DE , (SELECT CTY_NM FROM TB_CTY Y WHERE Y.CTY_CODE = X.CTY_CODE) CTY_NM , (SELECT CL_NM FROM TB_TOUR_CL Y WHERE Y.UPPER_CL_CODE = '00000' START WITH Y.CL_CODE = X.CL_CODE CONNECT BY PRIOR UPPER_CL_CODE = CL_CODE) UPPER_CL_NM , (SELECT CL_NM FROM TB_TOUR_CL Y WHERE Y.CL_CODE = X.CL_CODE) CL_NM , CASE WHEN X.HOTDEAL_AT = 'Y' AND (CASE WHEN A.CHKIN_DE IS NULL THEN A.TOUR_DE ELSE A.CHKIN_DE END) BETWEEN X.HOTDEAL_APPLC_BEGIN_DE AND X.HOTDEAL_APPLC_END_DE AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN X.HOTDEAL_BEGIN_DE AND X.HOTDEAL_END_DE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS HOTDEAL_AT , ORIGIN_AMOUNT , PURCHS_AT FROM TB_CART_GOODS A INNER JOIN TB_GOODS X ON X.GOODS_CODE = A.GOODS_CODE AND X.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND A.EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.PURCHS_AT = 'N' ORDER BY DECODE(X.CL_SE, 'S', A.CHKIN_DE, A.TOUR_DE), A.BEGIN_TIME

SELECT A.CART_SN , B.SETUP_SE , DECODE(B.SETUP_SE, 'R', '객실', 'E', '식사', 'C', '체크인/아웃', 'P', '인원') SETUP_NM , B.NMPR_CND , B.SETUP_AMOUNT , B.SETUP_RATE , A.NMPR_CO , (SELECT X.CODE_NM FROM TB_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE X WHERE X.CODE_ID = 'COM008' AND X.CODE = B.CO_UNIT_SE) UNIT_NM FROM TB_CART_NMPR A , TB_GOODS_NMPR B WHERE A.CART_SN = #CART_SN# AND A.GOODS_CODE = B.GOODS_CODE AND A.NMPR_SN = B.NMPR_SN AND A.SETUP_SE = B.SETUP_SE ORDER BY A.CART_SN, B.SETUP_SE DESC, B.SORT_ORDR, B.NMPR_SN

SELECT A.CART_SN , A.GOODS_CODE , A.PURCHS_AMOUNT , A.TOUR_DE , A.BEGIN_TIME , A.END_TIME , A.BEGIN_TIME||A.END_TIME AS TOUR_TIME , X.GOODS_NM , X.GOODS_INTRCN , X.FILE_CODE , X.WAIT_TIME , X.MVMN_TIME , A.WRITNG_ID , TO_CHAR(A.WRITNG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') WRITNG_DE , A.CHKIN_DE , A.CHCKT_DE FROM TB_CART_GOODS A INNER JOIN TB_GOODS X ON X.GOODS_CODE = A.GOODS_CODE AND X.DELETE_AT = 'N' WHERE A.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND A.CART_SN = #cart_sn# AND A.EXPRTN_AT = 'N' AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'

SELECT A.NMPR_SN , A.NMPR_CND , A.SETUP_AMOUNT , NVL(X.NMPR_CO,0) AS NMPR_CO FROM TB_GOODS_NMPR A LEFT JOIN TB_CART_NMPR X ON A.GOODS_CODE = X.GOODS_CODE AND A.NMPR_SN = X.NMPR_SN AND X.ESNTL_ID = #esntl_id# AND X.CART_SN = #cart_sn# WHERE A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.GOODS_CODE = #goods_code# ORDER BY A.NMPR_SN ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TB_CART_GOODS SET PURCHS_AMOUNT = ORIGIN_AMOUNT WHERE CART_SN = #cart_sn#
